FuncDef: The display cpu-usage monitor history command displays historical CPU usage overload information. The display cpu-usage monitor history command displays historical CPU usage overload information.
CLIs: display cpu-usage monitor history [ slot <slotId> [ cpu <cpuid> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of  characters. You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value from the displayed value range.

Specifies a CPU ID.
The value is a string of  characters. You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value from the displayed value range.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display cpu-usage monitor history slot 1 cpu 0
